title: Insane Lag

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Its not my local network, its not my ISP.** The lag starts right after the hop leaves LVL3 and hits Riots NA server**. Any status on this?


This only started after this patch dropped. I went from stable 20ms every game to constant 225ms+.

replies.body: So the lag definitely starts after it leaves level three, but it starts on line 11 (4.15.84.86) which isn't a Riot server. This is an issue stemming from your ISP, and this traceroute should be efficient data to show them proof of some problem with their node or routing.

the same thing been happening to me , i had a constant ping of 16 now its 200+. when i play on pbe i get around 20 if i go from pbe to NA server it just goes up to 200 and if i go back to pbe its stuck at 200 as well . been trying everything to try and fix but the problem not coming from my end and riot seems to not know or care about this , so im just done with the game until this gets fixed, if it even gets attention from them i dont know
How is this not a bigger deal and affecting more people?
